author: nemisist
content: just so everyone knows that <@!445622526241144835> has scammed there customers with the intel FPGAs from SQRL. no one should ever trust a scammer like him. its been almost 2 years and no product and no refund this is a PSA to keep all safe from him. while he has shown me and a few others the FPGAs he got with our money while in a zoom chat with <@!318272156305981440> .  everyone should know who they are dealing with.
